name: PULI INU
description: Puli (PULI) delivers simple yet very addicting P2E games supported by a novel NFT system. The first game, Puli Runner, was successfully launched on 31 January 2022. The team has also acquired a gaming studio for the development of future Play-to-Earn games. In addition, the token is supported by Lightspeed Crypto Services, LLC to support mobile game support on Android and IOS.The purpose and key features of the token include a 10% Buy and 10% Sell tax that are used to fund aggressive marketing, development, and  stable liquidity. In addition, the asset can be staked for added earnings with instructions available at their website.
